greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Decimal expansion of Product_{k>=1} (1-1/4^k).
link: G. C. Greubel, Table of n, a(n) for n = 0..1200
Eric Weisstein's World of Mathematics, Infinite Product
Eric Weisstein's World of Mathematics, q-Pochhammer Symbol
formula: Equals exp(-Sum_{k>0} sigma_1(k)/(k*4^k)) where sigma_1() is A000203(). - _Hieronymus Fischer_, Aug 07 2007
Equals (1/4; 1/4)_{infinity}, where (a;q)_{infinity} is the q-Pochhammer symbol. - _G. C. Greubel_, Nov 30 2015
results.author: _Eric W. Weisstein_, Nov 09 2004
